title: NO Power outages from 13th to 15th April
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Thre will be NO Power Outages on April 13th, 14th, 15th, said the Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka.
However, 2 hours & 15-minute power cuts will be in effect on 16th & 17th April between 8 AM and 5 PM.
Galle – Matara Road blocked by protest against delayed gas supply
Another Sri Lankan dies in fuel queue; 5th such death so far
